Response DTO that provides device filtering options with count metadata for building dynamic filter interfaces in device management UIs.

## Key Components

- **DeviceFilterResponse** - Main response class containing all available filter options
- **Filter Categories** - Statuses, device types, OS types, organization IDs, and tags
- **Count Metadata** - Each filter option includes count information for UI display
- **Filtered Count** - Total number of devices matching current filter criteria

## Usage Example

```java
// Example API response structure
DeviceFilterResponse filterResponse = DeviceFilterResponse.builder()
    .statuses(List.of(
        DeviceFilterItem.builder()
            .value("ONLINE")
            .count(45)
            .build(),
        DeviceFilterItem.builder()
            .value("OFFLINE")
            .count(12)
            .build()
    ))
    .deviceTypes(List.of(
        DeviceFilterItem.builder()
            .value("TABLET")
            .count(32)
            .build()
    ))
    .osTypes(List.of(
        DeviceFilterItem.builder()
            .value("ANDROID")
            .count(50)
            .build()
    ))
    .filteredCount(57)
    .build();

// Access filter data for UI rendering
int onlineDeviceCount = filterResponse.getStatuses()
    .stream()
    .filter(status -> "ONLINE".equals(status.getValue()))
    .findFirst()
    .map(DeviceFilterItem::getCount)
    .orElse(0);
```
